title: (x) Monoline script on vintage 1958 Omega Ranchero watch face - various alternatives {Stewf}
content:
Please help me to identify this vintage script font from the face of a 1958 Omega Ranchero watch. Thanks for your time!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113511im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ranchero_4136.jpg)
author: billegoat

comments.content: This was probably engraved by hand, not based on a typeface. There are a few digital fonts that come close: [Handsome](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113511/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/shinntype/handsome_pro_ot/), [Monoline Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113511/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/monoline_script_std_regular/), [Matinee Idol](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113511/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/comicraft/matinee_idol/), [Swing](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014113511/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/swing_std_regular/)

Thanks so much Stephen. Those are definitely close, and I'll try to make them work. If anyone else thinks of something, I'd really appreciate it.

Happy Holidays,
